resources.string: Cyberbullying can kill, imagine you are the person that this was done to you, would you be happy?
So what joy does it bring you to talk about the other persons looks, no one is perfect.
What makes you think because you make more money than them to ridicule them like this?
Does bullying make you feel better about yourself?
Imagine it was one of your family members being bullied.
Start your day with a smile.
Today is your day to be the best person you could ever be, surprise everyone by being the best.
Peace and harmony starts with you.
